sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Form, Button, Icon } from 'semantic-ui-react'

function CakeForm({ orderDescription, title,image, handleInputChange, handleCreateCake }) {
  const createBtnDisabled = orderDescription.trim() === ''
  return (
    <Form onSubmit={handleCreateCake}>
      <Form.Group>
        <Form.Input
          name='orderDescription'
          placeholder='Description *'
          value={orderDescription}
          onChange={handleInputChange}
        />


        <Button icon labelPosition='right' disabled={createBtnDisabled}>
          Create<Icon name='add' />
        </Button>
      </Form.Group>
    </Form>
  )
}

export default CakeForm
